snippet: Barring a settlement, the collective bargaining agreement will expire Saturday and the N.H.L. is expected to lock out players for the third time in 18 years.
abstract: Barring a settlement, the collective bargaining agreement will expire Saturday and the N.H.L. is expected to lock out players for the third time in 18 years.

byline.original: By JEFF Z. KLEIN and KEN BELSON

headline.main: N.H.L. Lockout Looms; Contract Enters Final Week
